name: Asian Cargo Sim
description:
You only need a few seconds to enter this atmosphere.

Delicate music, the taste of spicy food, polite people, do you feel it? Asian Cargo Sim presents a different simulation truck game. Only here you can take time off from work to admire a tuk tuk on the road.
Not to mention the beautiful views that surround you all along the route. It's not work, but it's a pleasure. You can't even add anything, as it would be superfluous. Simply enjoy by doing your work!

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- Different goods that must be carried carefully
- Lack of traffic rules
- Time limit
